long_description: The Sea To Summit pocket trowel makes backcountry bathroom trips a breeze. Lightweight aluminum alloy handle and hard-anodized aluminum blade are strong and durable-great for digging holes in hard ground. Pop the rear cap off to store toilet paper, lighter and hand sanitizer in the hollow handle. Handle collapses to fit within the blade for compact storage; carry sack included. Sea To Summit promotes following Leave No Trace principles when traveling in the backcountry.
short_description: The Sea To Summit pocket trowel makes backcountry bathroom trips a breeze.
